creditline: Gift of Bill and Krista Thorburn
description: abstract image; biomorphic forms with red forms at top and vertical golden brown forms at bottom; horizon line with red dotted "sky" and green shaded "ground"
signed: at bottom in orange, green and purple ink: \"Surrealist Landscape\" / or / \"RED ROCK VARIATION\" - MASONIC HOSPITAL - U of M - MINNEAPOLIS / AUTOMATIC TECHNIQUES - APRIL 18, 1985
title: Surrealist Landscape or Red Rock Variation - Masonic Hospital - U of M - Minneapolis
